title: Handle with care: glass
creator_credit: Mohan Wadhwani, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: A brief history of the Indian glass industry, contrasting the products of the individual artisan and the modern streamlined factory. To aid the industry, the Government established the Central Glass and ceramic Research Institute in Calcutta to conduct research into new types of glass.
